FuncDef: The reset rip configuration command resets the configuration parameters of the specific RIP process. When the RIP process is initiated, the default configuration parameters are restored to the default value.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the RIP process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset rip configuration command resets the configuration parameters of the specific RIP process. When the RIP process is initiated, the default configuration parameters are restored to the default value.
Precautions
Restarting RIP processes may interrupt services. Therefore, exercise caution when running the reset rip command.
After being restarted, all RIP processes adopt default configurations.
